id.description: The ID used to identify this compnent in Dash callbacks

data.description:
JSON describing the visualization of the crystal structure, generated
by pymatgen's MaterialsProjectStructureVis class

value.description: The pymatgen Structure, stored for convenience (not used internally by viewer)

generationOptions.description: Options used for generating visualization, stored for convenience (not used internally by viewer)

visibilityOptions.description:
Whether or not to display atoms, bonds, etc.
(This also includes specific polyhedra tags, might
 separate this into a separate prop later)

rotationSpeed.description: Amount to rotate about y-axis per frame

setProps.description:
Dash-assigned callback that should be called whenever any of the
properties change

n_screenshot_requests.description: Increment to trigger a screenshot request
